item.title: The challenge of provenance
item.description: BRUK HISTORICAL RECORDS SOM BEGREP Alternative versions of content A worry about whether you can trust archives has been gnawing at me lately. In part due to the strides generative AI has made over the past year, and in part due to Henrik G. Bastiansen’s book1 about mass digitization at the National Library of Norway (and the subsequent panel discussion about the book held here at the National Library a few weeks back2).
